title: VR-Based Advanced Learning Course on Accounting Equations

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening accounting competencies applicable to workplaces through smartphone-based VR learning.

learning_goals: Learners can explain how the asset=liability+equity equation is applied in actual transaction processes through VR simulations.
Learners can accurately record complex transactions (compound accounting events) using non-traditional learning materials (e.g., visual storytelling, interactive simulations).
Learners can identify accounting errors and propose corrective measures using VR tools in PBL team projects.
Learners can write a report comparing cognitive load differences between VR and traditional material learning conditions in summative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
